name: SetPlayerInterior
description: Set a player's interior. A list of currently known interiors and their positions can be found here.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to set the interior of.

params_body.name: interiorid
params_body.description: The interior ID to set the player in.

return_values: 0: The function failed to execute. This means the player is not connected.
pawn_code:
// Set player to default interior (outside)
SetPlayerInterior(playerid, 0);
related_fn:
GetPlayerInterior: Get the current interior of a player.
 LinkVehicleToInterior: Change the interior that a vehicle is seen in.
 OnPlayerInteriorChange: Called when a player changes interior.
related_cb: OnPlayerInteriorChange: Called when a player changes interior.
